tree.title: ClimateKit
tree.text1: Measure and display the carbon footprint of an e-commerce shopping cart with our CarbonBot
tree.text2: Follow the CO2 curve generated by your activity
tree.text3: Contribute through the financing of labeled projects
tree.description: If you have already created your ClimateKit space, log in now to calculate the carbon footprint of your activity.

shipping_address.text2: to allow the calculation of your delivery footprint.
